text: Marji (, transliteration: marjiʿ; plural: marājiʿ), also known as a marji' taqlīd () or marji' dīnī (), is a title given to the highest level of Twelver Shia authority. The Grand Ayatollah has power given by a hawzah to make legal decisions within Islamic law for followers and clerics. ==References== Category:Islamic religious leaders Category:Shia Islam
title: Marja'
